price: 38.Kinnih immay usuk Yi-Yallaay Yi- Rabbi kinni, kaadu anu yi-Rabbiy yoo ginet agleytah kay ginok num kaat mahaa kaah aba qibaadal kaak iyye.
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
